title: EET, SSE team for 40MW green hydrogen project
description: Essar Energy Transition and SSE are collaborating on a 40 MW green hydrogen project in northwest England. The Gowy Green Hydrogen project, located at the Stanlow Manufacturing Complex, aims to decarbonise industrial operations and secure jobs. The facility could be operational by 2028, with planning applications expected in 2025.
